code: import{GET_SINGLE_ITEM,DECREMENT_QTY,ADD_TO_CART,GET_LIST,WATCH_PRODUCT_LIST,WATCH_SINGLE_ITEM}from'../../actionTypes';export var watchfetchProducts=function watchfetchProducts(){return{type:WATCH_PRODUCT_LIST};};export var watchfetchSingleProducts=function watchfetchSingleProducts(){return{type:WATCH_SINGLE_ITEM};};export var fetchProducts=function fetchProducts(product){return{type:GET_LIST,payload:product};};export var getSingleItem=function getSingleItem(){return{type:GET_SINGLE_ITEM};};export var addToCart=function addToCart(product,qty){return{type:ADD_TO_CART,payload:{product:product,qty:qty}};};export var decrementQty=function decrementQty(productId){return{type:DECREMENT_QTY,productId:productId};};
